apps.title: Quantum Worlds Store
apps.description: Explore 10 experimental P2P networked universes - from floating quantum gardens to fractal forests, music dimensions to dying stars. Each world offers unique multiplayer experiences with stunning visuals and innovative mechanics.

apps.title: Quantum Garden of Floating Islands
apps.description: Explore interconnected floating islands with bioluminescent plants, crystalline waterfalls flowing upward, and shifting gravity. Plant glowing seeds that grow into shared structures in real-time.

apps.title: Neon Synthwave City at Perpetual Sunset
apps.description: Massive cyberpunk metropolis in eternal pink/purple sunset. Flying cars, holographic billboards, underground raves, rooftop gardens. The city breathes with the music.

apps.title: Collaborative Music Garden
apps.description: Every object generates tones, rhythms, or melodies. Build towers that harmonize, create rivers in musical scales. The world IS the instrument.

apps.title: Impossible Architecture Museum
apps.description: M.C. Escher-inspired gravity-defying staircases, infinite loops, non-euclidean geometry. Walk on walls, doors lead to sky, hallways twist into themselves.

apps.title: Bioluminescent Deep Ocean Trench
apps.description: Alien underwater abyss with zero-gravity swimming. Giant glowing jellyfish, hydrothermal vents, ancient ruins. Discover and illuminate new species together.

apps.title: Particle Physics Playground
apps.description: Players ARE subatomic particles. Race through particle accelerators, collide to create elements, observe quantum tunneling. Experience physics at Planck scale.

apps.title: Zero-G Space Station Build Zone
apps.description: Float in orbit building a modular space station. Pure 6DOF movement, solar panels must face sun, external construction requires coordination.

apps.title: Fractal Forest of Infinite Recursion
apps.description: Every tree contains a smaller version of the entire forest. Zoom into leaves to find ecosystems. Shrink and grow to explore different scales of reality.

apps.title: Living Paint Dimension
apps.description: Blank canvas where every movement leaves living, animated paint. Footsteps create gardens, jumping spawns creatures, spinning makes galaxies. Resets daily.

apps.title: Ancient Ruins on a Dying Star
apps.description: Explore alien temples on a red giant about to go supernova. Lava walkways over plasma seas, solar flares, ancient obelisks. Race against time before the star explodes.
